name: 空気読み。２ - KY度 診断 - 暇つぶしゲーム
name_original: 空気読み。２ - KY度 診断 - 暇つぶしゲーム
description:
Cumulative total of the series has exceeded 6 million downloads

Can you read the air?

It's the first time ever (!?) "Air readable" diagnostic game that you can read the air alone without worrying about anyone's eyes, that is "air reading."
The basic rule is that you can move the red one in the screen. Mainly, I will operate the hero "you", but sometimes I will manipulate different things depending on the situation. By playing 100 questions, it is evaluated how much air was readable.
Please fully enjoy the time of your dream that you can read the air alone.
【Portal site】
"PC" http://kuukiyomi.com/
"Smartphone" http://kuukiyomi.com/sp/
